queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.volumeMounts.name={{release-name-pvc-cfg}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator-delete}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator-delete}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator-delete}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator-delete}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator-delete}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator-delete}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator-delete}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator-delete}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory
Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, create, delete, patch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Name Undefined Or Empty
queries.description: A Kubernetes Pod should have a Service Account defined so to restrict Kubernetes API access, which means the attribute 'serviceAccountName' should be defined and not empty.

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator-delete}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "create", "delete", "patch"]]

queries.description: A Service Account token is shared between workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{secret-generator}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{secret-generator}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{secret-generator}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamconfig-test}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig-test}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamconfig-test}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamwrp-default-test}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamconfig}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamconfig}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamconfig}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator-delete}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{secret-generator-delete}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isam-secret-generator-delete}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{secret-generator-delete}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamwrp-default}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-isamwrp-default}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-isamwrp-default}}
